name: Andrew E.
description: '''Andrew Ford Valentino Espiritu''' (born July 30, 1967), known professionally as '''Andrew E.''', is a Filipino rapper and actor. He is best known in the Philippines for his 1990 debut hit single "Humanap Ka ng Panget" ("''Find an Ugly Person''"). Andrew E. won a Rap Album of the Year award for his album ''Clubzilla'' at the 2010 [[PMPC Star Awards for Television|PMPC Star Awards]] for Music. His single "Shoot Shoot Part 2" was later used as an instrumental for the campaign jingle "Heto Na [[Inday Sara]]".
